name: BLACK ADAM
text: Nearly 5,000 years after he was bestowed with the almighty powers of the Egyptian gods-and imprisoned just as quickly-Black Adam is freed from his earthly tomb, ready to unleash his unique form of justice on the modern world.

name: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
text: On Halloween, Gotham City mayor Don Mitchell Jr. is murdered by a serial calling himself the Riddler. Billionaire Bruce Wayne, who has opereleaseDate for two years as the vigilante Batman, investigates alongside the Gotham City Police Department (GCPD).

name: THOR: LOVE AND THUNDER
text: After the events of Avengers Endgame, Thor now sets off on a personal journey of discovering who he is through inner peace. But now Thor is called back into action once more when he takes on a deadly new adversary named Gorr the God Butcher, who seeks the extedtionPG-13 of all the gods.
